title: Moraira: The Spanish Amalfi Coast You Haven't Discovered Yet
excerpt: Often overlooked but absolutely stunning, Moraira offers the Mediterranean charm of Italy's Amalfi Coast with Spanish hospitality. Discover why discerning travelers and investors are rediscovering this hidden gem.
author: New Build Homes Costa Blanca
